fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you use the Factional Attack, you may instead choose to bomb your target's target, killing anyone intending on visiting them.
- Because you have to depart and land, you cannot use your ability two nights in a row.
- Intercepting a visit will cause the visit to fail.

fields.name: Upgrade:
fields.value:
- 1 use Basic defense.
- Gain a use of your ability.
- You will no longer need to wait a night to use your ability.
